item.title: Install Python
item.description: Install Python # How to install Python # There a couple of ways to install Python in your computer: You can go to the official page and follow the given instructions for your operation system. You can use the Python Version Manager RVM. Validate Python is installed # Once you have Python installed you should be able to run the following command in the terminal: python -v # => python 3.
